articles.description: Shares of Balkrishna Industries have gained 22% in the last six trading sessions.
articles.content: Nearly half of the 25 analysts that have coverage on Balkrishna Industries Ltd., have a cautious stance on the tyre manufacturer's road ahead post its March quarter results. The stock though, is the … [+1907 chars]

articles.title: Nomura upgrades Vodafone Idea and raises price target by over 100%; Tariff hike key trigger - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Nomura expects the entire telecom industry to take a material tariff hike of 15% following the conclusion of the Lok Sabha election.
articles.content: Brokerage firm Nomura has upgraded Vodafone Idea to "neutral" from its earlier rating of "sell," marking the second upgrade for the telecom service provider this month.The brokerage said that Vodafon… [+2527 chars]
